// import Carousel from "react-multi-carousel"; // import "react-multi-carousel/lib/styles.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./Cards.css"; import aa from "../../Images/aa.jpeg"; import bb from "../../Images/bb.jpeg"; import cc from "../../Images/cc.jpeg"; import instance from '../../api'; import axios from 'axios'; const Cards = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchProductsAndCategories = async () => { try { const [productsResponse, categoriesResponse] = await axios.all([ instance.get('/api/products'), instance.get('/api/categories') ]); console.log('products', productsResponse ) console.log('categories', categoriesResponse) setProducts(productsResponse.data); setCategories(categoriesResponse.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching data', error.message); } }; fetchProductsAndCategories(); }, []); return ( <>
{products.product.name} |
Furniture - Appliances - Household See all

{product.title}

{product.description.substring(0, 100)}...

More details |

))}
